rules_text:
Up to two target creatures each get +X/+X and gain trample until end of turn, where X is the greatest power among creatures you control.
Homestead {R}{G} [i]({R}{G}: Exile this card from your hand as a sorcery. Cast it on a later turn by tapping untapped creatures you control with total power greater than or equal to its mana value.)[/i]
